title: Return to In-Person Work
summary: The document titled "Return to In-Person Work" is a memorandum issued on January 20, 2025, by the White House, directing the heads of executive departments and agencies to end remote work arrangements. It mandates that employees return to their respective duty stations on a full-time basis as soon as practicable, while allowing for necessary exemptions as determined by agency heads. The implementation of this directive is to be consistent with applicable law. This memorandum signifies a shift in workplace policy towards in-person operations following a period of remote work.
